subtitleNullable: Reviews for stc service in Saudi Arabia from 2015-2021 more than 10K reviews
descriptionNullable:
### Story

My passion to scrape data from social media and was excited to collect data from Twitter because many information useful for companies to do many sentiment analysis  


### Context

This data was collected from Twitter using twint tool, collected based on specific keywords about STC service in Saudi Arabia from 2015-2021. This data contains over 10K tweet cleaned and pre-processed It need labeling the data so, your challenge is to classify it to positive negative and natural.


- This dataset contains 11 columns and 10K rows:

id: Id of the tweet 
date: Date and time of the tweet
user_id: Id of the user posting the tweet
name: Name of the user posting the tweet
retweet: Boolean type False (no retweet) - True (tweet retweeted)
nikes:  Count of how many times the same tweet is liked
nreplies:  Count of how many times the same tweet is replied
nretweets: Count of how many times the same tweet is re-tweeted.
tweet4: Tweet pos posted by the user

### Inspiration
You can use this data to make a sentiment analysis model understand customer behavior  

### Notebook 
https://www.kaggle.com/samaher133/stc-notebook
title: Tweets For Stc Service 2015-2021
